General.Name: Look Holdings Incorporated
General.Description: Look Holdings Incorporated plans, manufactures, and sells women apparels and related accessories in Japan and internationally. The company also manufactures and sells gelato; and provides logistics, storage, and inspection of products and merchandise services. It sells its products through its physical and online stores. It offers its products under the A.P.C., A.P.C. golf, IL BISONTE, IL BISONTE jewelry, IL BISONTE UOMO, KEITH, CLAUS PORTO, SCAPA, Debut de Fiore, Marimekko, LAISSÉ PASSÉ, Repetto, and Gelateria Marghera brands. The company was formerly known as Look Incorporated and changed its name to Look Holdings Incorporated in January 2018. The company was incorporated in 1944 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

1.Name: Masaaki  Saito
1.Title: Director and Sr. Operating Officer of Accounting & Fin.

2.Title: Operating Officer, GM of Personnel & Gen. Affairs Division
